EVERYONE!

The extension only works on Windows. This is because Windows has their own launcher. This extension calls it by using a roblox-client:// link. For users on Chrome OS use roblox://gameidhere to open it because the app store is based off of a mobile android device. I currently do not have a reason for Mac OS or Ubuntu users, but it is most likely the same.

If you see "Chrome OS Cannot open this page" error, there is no fixing that. To play ROBLOX on Chrome OS, download it from the Play Store. This is designed for Windows/Mac OS computers (maybe linux and it's distros.) Anyways, this application worked really well and helped me join games.
